title: "I am totally opposed to domestic violence of any kind": Trump
text:
"I am totally opposed to domestic violence of any kind": Trump 3:13pm EST - 00:34 
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he is opposed to domestic violence, speaking out on the matter a week after top aide Rob Porter resigned under the weight of allegations from two former wives that he committed domestic abuse.
